scripts.say: Oh, riiiight, joke's on me...
Your "we" and "us" were of course referring to Zuikaku's and Shoukaku's support... *Sigh*, I never stood a chance against you, did I? I admit defeat.
Don't be too hard on yourself. You nearly had me for a moment there.
Perhaps, but you turned the tables on me in the blink of an eye... I see now why how you've earned your reputation...
(I know about her rigging inside out, and I maintained my distance properly... Even excluding the surprise airstrike, I shouldn't have lost this!)
(I don't even have any idea of what I did wrong! This person is a monster!)
Let me guess: you're thinking "this person is a monster," aren't you?
Ah, n-no, well, not I don't mean it that way...!
Good. I was afraid I scared you off.
Even with your liberal use of airstrikes, you attacked me with rational tactics. You didn't simply rely on your perception of having an overwhelming advantage and charge straight at me.
Hahah! Nevertheless, I must say these changing times are wonderful. Engines, cannons, and aircraft are all stronger than ever.
I'm forced to admit that I am very much stuck in the past.
(She can casually admit how old-fashioned she is? Spoken like a true veteran...)
But do not pity me. A soldier cannot do their duty if they ignore the truth.
I wish an old-timer such as myself wouldn't need to fight, but the world is blind to age.
When the Sakura Empire needs me, I will not stand by and watch. I will do everything necessary to fulfill my obligations to my nation.
That is my duty. The duty which my past comrades entrusted me with. The duty I must and will carry out, no matter how the times may change.
Mikasa held her hand before her chest and clenched it into a fist.
I have heard that other factions will participate in the ritual. From my experiences, I am concerned about whether or not these islands will sufficiently protected during the ritual.
Of course. I appreciate your thoughtfulness and apologize for any concern caused.
Ahahaha! Okay, Zuikaku, Shoukaku. It's time to head onto the main islands!
(The empty pursuit of power leads to ruination, and the empty pursuit of knowledge leads one astray.)
(Akagi, how long will it take you to understand...?)
